The teacher said: This is a fantastic way of doing something completely different.`` There is a mix of acts performing in the Britain's Got Talent part of the panto, so it gives all the pupils a chance to shine. Unfortunately continued coverage of events connected to my old job at the News of the World has made it difficult for me to give the 110 percent needed in this role, Andy Coulson said in an e-mailed statement today.`` Nothing is more important than the government's task of getting this country back on its feet.'' The PM said: This is all about the past. It has gone on and on and I can understand why he feels the pressure of that.`` I choose to judge him by the work he has done for me for the government and for the country. He has run the Downing Street press office in a very straightforward, professional and competent way . David Cameron said he compared Andy Coulson 's regime favourably to`` the days of dodgy dossiers, Alastair Campbell , Damian McBride , and all that nonsense we had from the past government''. The 1990-1991 Gulf War saw a rigid application of the`` Colin Powell Doctrine,'' which the general later explained meant exhausting all political, economic and diplomatic means.
